description:
Get drought-resistant grass with Drought Defense

Drought Defense is a liquid lawn treatment specifically formulated for California lawns to enhance drought resilience.

Utilizing advanced surfactant technology along with seaweed and potassium, it maximizes water efficiency and strengthens grass against dry conditions.

Consciously formulated without pesticides and harmful nonylphenol ethoxylates (NPEs), Sunday champions planet-friendly solutions for your lawn's unique environmental challenges.

sections.product_features:
0-0-1 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) liquid lawn fertilizer
Enhances drought resiliency and reduces water use
Ideal for lawns that experiences dry summer heat
Made for all common grass types
Zero pesticides, zero burn risk
User-friendly hose-on application
Covers up to 2,500 sq. ft.
sections.ingredients:
Wetting agent: soil hydration and drought resilience
Seaweed and potassium: Enhanced heat tolerance
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply before drought conditions set in, preferably during the early morning or late evening. Ensure your lawn is well-hydrated before application.
Connect the custom-engineered sprayer to the hose and pouch. Our sprayer will help you apply at the perfect water-to-nutrient ratio.
Distribute evenly across your lawn until the pouch is depleted— typically in 10-15 minutes.
Water your lawn thoroughly post-application. Once the lawn dries, you can get back out on your grass.
Reapply every 4 weeks spring through fall, up to 8 times per year.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
How to use with other Sunday products?
Let liquid fertilizers dry completely before applying anything else to the lawn if using other Sunday products. For best results, use lawn fertilizer in combination with weed control and grass seed. This will help you feed properly, reduce weeds, and introduce better grasses to your lawn.
Application based on yard size:
1,000–2,500 sq. ft.: 1 pouch
2,500–5,000 sq. ft.: 2 pouches
5,000–7,500 sq. ft.: 3 pouches
What is a surfactant or wetting agent?
A surfactant or wetting agent helps water spread more evenly and penetrate the soil, improving water absorption and retention. Ultimately, this can help manage water more efficiently and conserve critical water resources.
How does Drought Defense help my lawn survive drought?
Drought Defense enhances drought resilience by maximizing water efficiency and strengthening grass against dry conditions using advanced surfactant technology and key nutrients.
How can I recover my lawn from drought?
To recover your lawn from drought, apply Drought Defense as a post-drought lawn recovery treatment, which will aid in hydrating and reviving stressed grass.
Why is this not included in my lawn plan subscription?
Drought Defense is a specialized product designed to give your lawn extra resilience during dry periods. Our subscription plans include a range of essential nutrients to keep your lawn healthy, but we offer Drought Defense as an optional add-on to keep your plan customizable and cost-effective.
If you'd like to boost your lawn's drought resilience and reduce water usage, we encourage you to add Drought Defense to your care routine. It's a great way to help your lawn thrive—even in dry conditions.
